variant.question:
Given the following NOTAM information, what changes apply to the missed approach procedure on RWY 24?

\>>> EDDK KOLN/BONN<<< DUE TO MAINT OF WYP VOR THE FLW CHANGES TO APCH AND MISSED APCH PROC OCCUR: RWY 14L: AMEND CONVENTIONAL MISSED APCH TO READ: CLIMB STRAIGHT AHEAD 3000, WHEN PASSING 2000 OR 2.8 DME KBO, WHICHEVER IS LATER, LT DIRECT TO WYP INT. RWY 24: AMEND CONVENTIONAL MISSED APCH TO READ: CLIMB STRAIGHT AHEAD TO 2100 FT MSL OR 3.5 DME KBO, WHICHEVER IS LATER, RT DIRECT TO WYP INT CLIMBING 5000FT MSL. REF AD 2 EDDK 4-2-1, 4-4-1, 4-2-2, 4-4-2, 4-6-2 AND 4-6-4 ALL DATED 10 DEC 2015.: NOTAM ED/A0709/16 ILS OUTER MARKER RWY 24: CHECK DME READING ADDITIONALLY &MARKER NOT REMOTE CONTROLLED.: NOTAM ED/A0699/16 >>> END OF BULLETIN <<<

options.text: CHECK DME READING ADDITIONALLY MARKER NOT REMOTE CONTROLLED
WHEN PASSING 2000 OR 2.8 DME KBO, WHICHEVER IS LATER, LT DIRECT TO WYP INT.
CLIMB STRAIGHT AHEAD TO 2100 FT MSL OR 3.5 DME KBO, WHICHEVER IS LATER.
COMPLY WITH CONVENTIONAL MISSED APCH AS READ.

variant.question:

DUE WIP RWY 07R/25L CLSD 18 DEC TIL 11 JAN RWY 07L/25R AVBL 0600 TIL 2200 EXC FM 24 TIL 26 DEC

options.text: January 11th, 0600 UTC.
January 10th, 2300 UTC.
Anytime on the 26th of December.
Anytime on the 24th of December.

variant.question:
Given the following NOTAM, are you able to fly passengers into EUAD on a charter flight?

Q EGTT/QAZCA/IV/NBO/AE/000/022/5334N00021W003 A EUAD B FROM: 15/12/08 09:42 C TO: PERM E AERODROME ATZ ACTIVE 0620-2115 DAILY. AD OPEN, ATS AVBL, USE OF THE AD IS PRIOR PERMISSION REQUIRED 0620-0630 UTC FOR NON SKED MOVEMENTS. EUAD AD 2.3 AND AD 2.17 REFER

options.text: Yes, you can fly in at any time between 06:20-21:15 UTC daily.
Yes, but you must file a flight plan before departing, at least two hours before the scheduled arrival time.
Yes, but you need prior permission between 06:20-21:15.
Yes, you can fly in at any time after 06:30 UTC, PPR for flights between 06:20 and 06:30 UTC.
